showScoreExcerpt:
“As ‘Spamalot’ is brimming with production numbers, it is really the principals performing alongside the ensemble that contribute most to the brilliance of the show. There’s lots of glitz in this production, mainly thanks to the colorful costumes...The only problem with ‘Spamalot’ is that it has to end.”

Read more
